name: Criminal Cleaners & Chasers Co.
description:
Criminal Cleaners and Chasers Co. Demo

In a world where superheroes are commonplace, your job is to round up the criminals they beat up and throw them in  jail! 

Drive around scenic worlds with procedural cities and clean up the city of crime! But watch out! the Mafia will be right on your tail trying to free your criminals and destroy your  Van!

Leave a comment with your thoughts on the game and Check out the full version when it comes out!

Cheat Codes:

herecomesthemoney - $999999

iamspeed - Infinite Boost

enemy - Spawn Mafia Vehicle

sanicspeed - Run Faster Jump Higher

gasgasgas - Restore Fuel

ineedhealing - Restore Health

stonks - Infinite Fuel and Health
